__Note1: type 1 => full access - applies to admins and teachers with profile >= 80%
__Note2: type 2 => restricted - applies to teachers with profile < 80%
__Note3: type 3 => anonymous - applies for public users
__Note4: jobs url is returned only for type 1

jobs.furtherInfo:
Successful Applicants will:
•	Identify with the unique vision of Escola Global
•	Be a fluent native English speaker who is proficient/committed to learning Spanish (other languages are also desirable)
•	Be an outstanding classroom practitioner, with at least two years experience and have worked with English National Curriculum
•	Be passionate, flexible and innovative 
•	Be a team player with excellent communication and inter-personal skills
•	Be reflective and committed to school improvement and professional development
jobs.title: Primary KS2 teacher

jobs.furtherInfo: The International School Moshi is looking for a strong Mathematics teacher with experience of teaching Mathematics to both Standard and Higher level of the IBDP to begin in January 2014 * This position may be considered for one of a teaching couple to fill both this vacancy and that of Boarding Parent. If interested in the position(s), please contact Alexis Toye on alexistoye@teacherhorizons.com
